body: The entire of 38 chapters from the last season was spent between the husband, the wife, and the sister-in-law finally admitting that they cheated on each other before finally breaking up their relationship instead of having a threesome that I hoped for. Now you are telling in this season, we have some guy who falls in love with his sister-in-law whom got delivered to him all naked by his deceased brother? Get ready for another epic melodrama season folks!
